price: 32. Dis : « Obéissez à Allah et au Messager. » Et s’ils se détournent, (qu’ils sachent qu’) Allah n’aime pas les mécréants. »
arabic: قُلۡ أَطِيعُواْ ٱللَّهَ وَٱلرَّسُولَۖ فَإِن تَوَلَّوۡاْ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يُحِبُّ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: qul aṭīʿū al-laha wal-rasūla fa-in tawallaw fa-inna al-laha lā yuḥibbu al-kāfirīna
